entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24.
